overview: Young Yeison lives all on his own in a simple country dwelling. He is so isolated from the rest of humanity he must hunt to survive. One day a man turns up and Yeison hides. Finding no one home, the man takes up residence. But what is Yeison afraid of? Why does he live alone? When the ghosts are made of flesh and blood, there is reason to doubt and flee from other humans.
title: Banished
